trans-unit.source: Defines a region of content within the design-time markup for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 在設計階段標記內為關聯的控制項定義內容區域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> object represents a region of content within the design-time markup that is generated by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>物件代表的內容由所產生之設計階段標記內的區域<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>實作。

trans-unit.source: A control developer uses designer regions in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> implementation to define separate areas within the design-time markup for the associated control and to provide editing and event handling for the area.
trans-unit.target: 控制項開發人員會使用自訂設計工具區域<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>實作來定義不同的區域內的相關聯控制項的設計階段標記，並提供編輯和事件處理的區域。

trans-unit.source: A visual designer, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], can use designer regions to display the separate areas of a control on the design surface and to raise user events for the region to the control designer.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化設計工具，例如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，可以使用設計工具區域，以顯示不同的區域的設計介面上的控制項，並引發使用者控制項設計工具區域的事件。

trans-unit.source: Designer regions can simplify a control designer implementation because many region-based features are provided by the base designer classes and the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: 因為許多區域為基礎的功能由設計工具的基底類別或提供視覺化設計工具，設計工具區域可簡化控制項設計工具的實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> class provides the base functionality for designer regions, such as the ability to click, select, and highlight a region in the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>類別設計工具區域，例如按一下時，可以選取此項目，並反白顯示在設計介面中的區域會提供基本功能。

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> object in a control designer implementation to define a region that does not require editing.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>控制項設計工具的實作，以定義不需要編輯在區域中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the derived <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion> class in a control designer implementation to define a region with editable content at design time.
trans-unit.target: 使用衍生<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion>控制項設計工具的實作，在設計階段定義包含可編輯的內容的區域中的類別。

trans-unit.source: Use the derived <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion> class in a control designer implementation to define an editable region that represents a template in a control.
trans-unit.target: 使用衍生<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedEditableDesignerRegion>控制項設計工具的實作，以定義可編輯區域，表示控制項中的範本中的類別。

trans-unit.source: To support regions within a class that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method and add one or more initialized <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要支援從衍生類別內的區域<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>，覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法並加入一個或多個初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>物件加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection>集合。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, you can handle mouse clicks in the regions on the design surface by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: （選擇性） 您可以藉由覆寫處理在設計介面上的區域中的滑鼠點選<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> object to determine how the region is displayed by the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用的屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>物件，以判斷該區域的視覺化設計工具的顯示方式。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selectable%2A> property to indicate that the region can be selected by the user on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Selectable%2A>屬性，表示在設計介面上的使用者，可以選取區域。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Highlight%2A> property to highlight the designer region in the visual designer; for example, you can highlight a region after a user has clicked to select it.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Highlight%2A>屬性來反白顯示在視覺化設計工具的設計工具區域比方說，您可以反白顯示區域之後，使用者已按一下來選取它。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DisplayName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A> properties to store or retrieve additional details about the region.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DisplayName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A>屬性，以儲存或擷取區域相關的其他詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: In particular, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A> property is used by the visual designer to display ToolTip information when the user moves the mouse pointer over the designer region.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A>屬性使用者將滑鼠指標移至設計工具區域上方時顯示工具提示資訊時供視覺化設計工具。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Designer%2A> property to access the methods and properties of the control designer object that contains the designer region.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Designer%2A>屬性來存取的方法和控制項設計工具物件，其中包含設計工具區域的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The control designer that contains this designer region.
trans-unit.target: 包含這個設計工具區域的控制項設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The name of this designer region.
trans-unit.target: 這個設計工具區域的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion" /> class with the specified name for a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用控制項設計工具的指定名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。

The input `designer` object.

trans-unit.target: 輸入的 `name` 物件。

trans-unit.target: `false`。

trans-unit.target: `null`。

<paramref name="name" /> is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The control designer that contains this designer region.
trans-unit.target: 包含這個設計工具區域的控制項設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The name of this designer region.
trans-unit.target: 這個設計工具區域的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to select the region; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示選取區域，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion" /> class with the specified name for a control designer, optionally setting the instance as a selectable region in the designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用控制項設計工具的指定名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion" /> 類別的新執行個體，並選擇性地將執行個體設定為設計工具中的可選取區域。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.target: 屬性

The input `designer` object.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the description for a designer region.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定設計工具區域的描述。

trans-unit.source: A text description of the designer region.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具區域的文字描述。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A> property is used by the design host to display ToolTip information when the user moves the mouse pointer over the designer region.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.Description%2A>屬性由設計主應用程式使用使用者將滑鼠指標移至設計工具區域上方時顯示工具提示資訊。

trans-unit.source: Defines the HTML attribute name for a designer region.
trans-unit.target: 定義設計工具區域的 HTML 屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The attribute name for a designer region is `_designerRegion`.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具區域的屬性名稱是`_designerRegion`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DesignerRegionAttributeName> field is used to identify regions within the design-time HTML markup for the control designer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.DesignerRegionAttributeName>欄位用來識別控制項設計工具區域內的設計階段 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the friendly display name for a designer region.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定設計工具區域的易記顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: A text display name for the designer region.
trans-unit.target: 設計工具區域的文字顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the region size is to be explicitly set on the designer region by the design host.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出設計主應用程式是否將在設計工具區域上明確設定區域大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the design host should set the size on the designer region; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果設計主應用程式應該在設計工具區域上設定大小，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of the designer region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 擷取設計介面上設計工具區域的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> representing the designer region size on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，表示設計介面上的設計工具區域大小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.GetBounds%2A> method returns a value that is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.GetBounds%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Designer%2A> object with this designer region.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.GetBounds%2A>方法會傳回值，該值相當於呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.GetBounds%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject.Designer%2A>物件與這個設計工具區域。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to highlight the designer region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要反白顯示設計介面上的設計工具區域。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the visual designer should highlight the designer region on the design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果視覺化設計工具應該反白顯示設計介面上的設計工具區域，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the designer region can be selected by the user on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以在設計介面上選取設計工具區域。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the designer region can be selected by the user on the design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者可以在設計介面上選取設計工具區域，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the designer region is currently selected on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出目前是否已在設計介面上選取了設計工具區域。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the designer region is currently selected on the design surface; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前已在設計介面上選取了設計工具區域，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets optional user data to associate with the designer region.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要與設計工具區域關聯的選擇性使用者資料。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains user data stored for the designer region.
trans-unit.target: 物件，包含針對設計工具區域儲存的使用者資料。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Within a control designer implementation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.UserData%2A> property to store or retrieve additional information for the designer region.
trans-unit.target: 在控制項的設計工具實作，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.UserData%2A>儲存或擷取設計工具區域的其他資訊的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the control designer implementation supports selecting from multiple designer regions, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.UserData%2A> property in a control designer to store a unique index for each region.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果控制項設計工具的實作會支援從多個設計工具區域中選取，您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.UserData%2A>控制項設計工具來儲存每個區域的唯一索引中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.UserData%2A> property for the region that is passed into the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to store the index for the currently selected region.
trans-unit.target: 然後您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion.UserData%2A>傳入的地區屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>方法，可儲存目前選定區域的索引。
